edu.cmu.pslc.logging

Class ToolMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.pslc.logging.Message
      • edu.cmu.pslc.logging.ToolMessage

  • public final class ToolMessage
extends Message
    The tutor message represents a logging element that originates from the tutor.
    Version:
    $Revision: 9303 $
    Last modified by: $Author: mkomisin $
    Last modified on: $Date: 2013-05-30 11:30:09 -0400 (Thu, 30 May 2013) $
    Author:
    Alida Skogsholm
